Text.Page:
Let's see...first the eyes, then distilled brain essence.

Feed this potion to him, and I think he'll come back to his senses.

And if the college deans ever ask you if you want to learn the secrets of mind-healing, just say, "No, I'll stick with dentistry." Trust me on this.

Eight, seven, six...and they're still watching me.

Hey! Hey! What's that!"Here, try this."

Where am I? And where's the rest of my unit?

The last thing I remember is being in Azarel's Labyrinth. And the gulas...they butchered everyone else.

Nilos? No, he wasn't one of them. I'm not sure he even had a patrol that day.

No Nilos. Is that supposed to be good news or bad news? It's getting so I can't tell anymore.

Regardless, you saved that man's mind, and you gave me at least some hope that Nilos is still out there. Somewhere.
